summary: Provides a background looping service that scans deployment configurations, determines when workflow runs should be scheduled, and persists those scheduled runs to the database. It also runs a rapid loop to promptly handle deployments that have been recently created or modified, ensuring near‑real‑time scheduling.
business_intent: Automate the creation of scheduled workflow executions based on deployment definitions, guaranteeing that both regular and newly updated deployments are executed on schedule without manual effort.
